generatedTitle: The History and Sponsors of the ICC World Cup Outside England in 1987

extractFactDictList.question: When was the ICC World Cup first hosted outside England?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The tournament was first hosted outside England in 1987, when India hosted the event.

extractFactDictList.sentence: The tournament was won by Australia, who defeated England in the final.
